conbody.p: Introducing the Photon Core Plus (X-101), a powerful yet easy-to-use microcontroller perfect for your next project! This tiny powerhouse operates at an impressive 32MHz speed, while its simple 3.3V voltage requirement makes it incredibly versatile. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a curious beginner, the Photon Core Plus will empower your creativity with its flexible I2C/SPI communication capabilities. Released March 18th, 2025, it's the latest innovation in microcontroller technology.
